doc.previous: Packaging advancements in the early 20th century included Bakelite closures on bottles transparent cellophane overwraps and panels on cartons increased processing efficiency and improved food safety As additional materials such as aluminum and several types of plastic were developed they were incorporated into packages to improve performance and functionality 16
doc.after: In 1952 Michigan State University became the first university in the world to offer a degree in Packaging Engineering 17
